content.rendered: Jual kamera CCTV Infinity dengan tersedia dengan type DVR HDTVI Kamera TDV-7408-H2C harga murah cuman Rp3,260,250!! DVR Infinity dapat menangkap gambar video bahkan dalam kondisi cahaya yang minim. Infinity HDTVI Kamera TDV-7408-H2C tipe kamera pengawas yang memiliki kelebihanTurbo HD DVR Features • Self-adaptive normal camera and infinity PoC camera connection • H.265 encoding for the main stream, and H.265/H.264 for the sub-stream of analog cameras • Self-adaptive HDTVI/HDCVI/AHD/CVBS signal input • Connectable to H.265+/H.265/H.264+/H.264 IP cameras • Up to 3 MP resolution for recording • Automatic power supply management for PoC camera to guarantee safety • Long distance transmission over UTP and coaxial cable • 8 ch synchronous playback

excerpt.rendered: Turbo HD DVR Features • Self-adaptive normal camera and infinity PoC camera connection • H.265 encoding for the main stream, and H.265/H.264 for the sub-stream of analog cameras • Self-adaptive HDTVI/HDCVI/AHD/CVBS signal input • Connectable to H.265+/H.265/H.264+/H.264 IP cameras • Up to 3 MP resolution for recording • Automatic power supply management for PoC camera to guarantee safety • Long distance transmission over UTP and coaxial cable • 8 ch synchronous playback
